items.summary: Fix the “No” button evasion positioning logic in `frontend/index.html` so the No button never moves outside the visible viewport safe area (i.e., it remains fully visible and clickable/tappable at all times), preventing it from disappearing after ~2 evasions.

Ensure the proposal flow continues correctly after the positioning fix: the No button reliably performs 7 successful evasions and only then reveals the Yes button, with behavior consistent across desktop and mobile.
